mapper.insert: insert into CEP_PROD_C values (#{mdn}, #{imsi}, #{state}, #{provinceCode}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), #{payType}, #{cityCode}, #{lteimsi,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.delete: delete from CEP_PROD_C t where t.mdn = #{mdn} or t.imsi = #{imsi}
mapper.update: update CEP_PROD_C t set t.imsi = #{imsi}, t.state = #{state}, t.provincecode = #{provinceCode}, t.updatetime = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), t.paytype = #{payType}, t.lanid = #{cityCode}, t.lteimsi = #{lteimsi,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where t.mdn = #{mdn}
mapper.select: select count(1) from CEP_PROD_C t where t.mdn = #{mdn} or t.imsi = #{imsi}
